page.title: 19OPINION OF BATHFORD RESIDENT
page.content: With detailed plans before me I pause & consider.There is no doubt that I want a quick journey to work {but do I want it at the expense of {destroying part of the environment? Various plans refer to high or low visual intrusion into landscape & high or low tree loss.{How far are we {justified in altering character of B {in order to move from A to C?}Plans speak of demolition of property but each unit destroyed represents{total {upheaval}for one family.We accept that present traffic conditions are unreasonable but where do individuals and cost in human terms come into our considerations? Perhaps we should consider whether solution is{not to make greater {provision for traffic}but simply to "pull back" into smaller units and lessen our dependence on{THE CAR.
